title: Mauigirl's Mango Salsa
directions: Stir mango, onion, bell pepper, cilantro, lime juice, jalapeno pepper, lime zest, and ginger in a bowl; cover and chill for 8 hours to overnight.
ingredients: ¼ cup chopped sweet onion (such as Maui)
¼ cup finely chopped red bell pepper
1  jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
